original_title: Sorolla, Promenades en Bord de Mer
overview: This film exhibition immerses you into the works of Joaqu√≠n Sorolla, one of the leading Spanish painters of the twentieth century.  Painter of light, the artist depicted the beauty of the seaside, combining realism and lyricism. Discover his entire oeuvre: from his regionalist interpretations of Spain to his family portraits, landscapes, and gardens, and the representations of the seaside that made him internationally famous.
title: Sorolla, Promenades en Bord de Mer
